flawed_nl_solution:
Three years ago, his sons were 16 - 3 = <<16-3=11>>11 years old.
Three years ago, Beau was 11 + 11 + 11 = <<11+11+11=33>>33 years old.
Today, Beau is 33 + 3 = <<33+3=36>>36 years old.
#### 36

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
